Issue.creator: denyeart
Issue.description: tar-stream@1.6.1 > bl@1.2.2 and 2 other path(s) This issue was fixed in versions: 2.2.1, 3.0.1, 4.0.3, 1.2.3 https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-pp7h-53gx-mx7r https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-node/blob/release-1.4/fabric-client/package.json#L42 Appears to be fixed in latest tar-stream. https://github.com/mafintosh/tar-stream/commit/25e191eb66a9de5652947f8846acbd3648e21ef4 Need to update fabric-client dependency and release a new version. >
